short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draw, erase, and manipulate pixels with ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need a fun and intuitive way to create stunning pixel art on the go? Look no further than Instant Pixel Editor, your pocket-sized studio for all things pixelated.

With Instant Pixel Editor you can:

Craft mesmerizing pixel masterpieces: Draw, erase, and manipulate pixels with ease, using a simple and intuitive interface designed for both beginners and seasoned artists.
